description: A lieutenant in the Japanese Comerican esper team Liberty Bell, Ken wields his clairvoyance alongside his partner Mary to perform the same kind of police work that B.A.B.E.L. does in Japan but on an international scale. In spite of being suspected of voyeurism at a hot spring resort, Ken befriends Minamoto and Sakaki who guide him through the correct technique for eating soba noodles. He and Mary are after Mute and Lige for unknown reasons.
name: Ken McGwire
